001package reversi;
002
003import java.util.List;
004
005public class Player extends Object{
006    protected Integer index;
007    protected String name;
008    protected Piece piece;
009    protected Table table;
010    
011    public Player(Integer index,String name,Table table){
012        this.index = index;
013        this.name = name;
014        this.piece = new Piece(index);
015        this.table = table;
016        return;
017    }
018
019    public void placePiece(Integer aColumn,Integer aRow){
020        Grid aGrid = table.getGrid(aColumn, aRow);
021        aGrid.placePiece(piece);
022        reversi(aGrid);
023        return;
024    }
025
026    public void reversi(Grid aGrid) {
027        List<Grid> nextGrids = aGrid.getNextGrids();
028        nextGrids.stream().filter(item -> reversiNext(item, nextGrids.indexOf(item)))
029                .forEach(item -> item.placePiece(piece));
030        return;
031    }
032
033    public Boolean reversiNext(Grid aGrid, Integer index) {
034        Integer color = aGrid.getPiece().getColor();
035        if (color > 0 && color != piece.getColor() && reversiColumn(aGrid.getNextGrid(index), index))
036            return true;
037        return false;
038    }
039
040    public Boolean reversiColumn(Grid aGrid, Integer index) {
041        Integer color = aGrid.getPiece().getColor();
042        if (color <= 0)
043            return false;
044        if (color == piece.getColor())
045            return true;
046        if (reversiColumn(aGrid.getNextGrid(index), index)) {
047            aGrid.placePiece(piece);
048            return true;
049        }
050        return false;
051    }
052
053    public void setTable(Table table){
054        this.table = table;
055        return;
056    }
057
058    public Piece getPiece(){
059        return piece;
060    }
061
062    public Boolean isComputer(){
063        return false;
064    }
065
066    public Integer getIndex(){
067        return index;
068    }
069
070    public String getName(){
071        return name;
072    }
073
074    public Integer getNumber(){
075        return piece.getNumber();
076    }
077}
